Title: The Great Silence
Writer: Sergio Corbucci (story), Vittoriano Petrilli (screenplay), Mario Amendola (screenplay), Bruno Corbucci (screenplay), Sergio Corbucci (screenplay), John Davis Hart (dialogue: English version), Lewis E. Ciannelli (dialogue: English version)
Actors: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Klaus Kinski, Frank Wolff, Luigi Pistilli
Plot: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.
